A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I was asked if I liked the film the best response I could come up with was: \"Is it possible to like a film but hate every detail about it?\"  I was visually entertained.  That's about it.  Unfortunately I can't just sit and watch mindlessly and as soon as I started to think about the things that were going on my enjoyment would plummet.  I always thought Star Wars was about good stories.  This film broke the narrative and led every set up from the previous film to a dead end.
